title: Empress Polki Jadau Kundan Necklace - The Maharani Haaram
materials: Fine Silver Alloy Base with Antique Hyderabadi Polish
Cultured Freshwater Pearls. High purity silver is used to enhance the brilliance of the polki diamonds.
features: Elaborate Polki Kundan setting handcrafted in the traditional Jadau style. The necklace features a broad collar with a floral motif using uncut Polki diamonds interspersed with vibrant pear-shaped emeralds. A stunning central pendant echoes the collar's design with a large oval emerald. Delicate pearl and emerald bead drops adorn the necklace's edge, adding a touch of elegance. The floral patterns and the central pendant showcases a timeless design that represents ancient Indian artistry.
occasions: Perfect for grand celebrations like weddings (Vivaha)
and special occasions like Seemantham or Half-Saree functions. Also a stunning piece for high-end social gatherings and formal events.
description: This necklace is a true heirloom piece, showcasing the exquisite craftsmanship of Hyderabadi Jadau jewelry. The use of uncut Polki diamonds gives it a unique, antique charm, while the vibrant emeralds add a touch of regal elegance. Its versatile design beautifully complements both traditional and contemporary attire. Each Polki diamond is hand-selected for its quality and brilliance. The antique finish ensures that the necklace will only grow more beautiful with age.
